services.name: Residential Cleaning
services.description: Transform your living space into a pristine haven with our residential cleaning services. We offer flexible scheduling to accommodate your busy life.

services.name: Commercial Cleaning
services.description: Professional cleaning services for offices, retail spaces, and businesses throughout Las Vegas. Customized plans to fit your schedule and budget.

services.name: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Deep Cleaning is a specialty cleaning that is recommended before residential cleaning is done. Thorough, detailed cleaning for your entire home.

services.name: Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning
services.description: Make moving a smoother, cleaner experience whether you're settling in or moving on.

services.name: Additional Services
services.description: Beyond our regular cleaning packages, we offer a range of detailed cleaning services to give your home a fresh, thorough touch.
